markdownRemark.html:
오늘은 diabetes raw data 가공부터 분석까지 하고, 내일은 wine-quality라고 txt 기반 DL을 배운다.
그 뒤에는 CNN으로 CIFAR-10 이미지를 활용해 google photo service처럼 사진을 분류하는 걸 만든다.
Transfer Learning으로 네이버 렌즈처럼 이미지 분류 시스템을 만든 뒤, YOLO를 배울 예정이다.

5일차

softmax 함수

출력층이 이항 노드이면 sigmoid를, 다항 노드이면 softmax를 쓴다.

전체 데이터 중에서 해당 데이터의 porsion.. 확률을 알기 위해 사용한다.

예제

딥러닝을 이용하여 강아지, 고양이, 코알라, 다람쥐를 분류할 때
각각의 이미지는 32 x 32 x 1 shape 을 가진다고 할 경우,

  1. 입력층(input layer) 노드 개수 32x32
  2. 출력층(output layer) 노드 개수 4 (activation function은 softmax)
  3. 학습을 마친 후, 임의의 1개 이미지에 대한 prediction 수행하였을 경우, prediction 에 대한 shape (1,4)
  4. ] 강아지 = 0, 고양이 = 1, 코알라 = 2, 다람쥐 = 3 으로 정답을 가정할 경우,

prediction 결과값이 [0.2 0.1 0.6 0.1] 인 경우, 입력된 이미지 2

insight

컴퓨터 비전 아키텍처의 내부를 들여다 볼 수 있는 창을 제공한다.
단순히 최대값만 뽑아 내는 거라면 sigmoid로도 충분하다.
=> 이것을 text로 표혀낳는 게 XAI

cf. IMAGENET CHALLENGE

callback

register -> function call -> callback
ex) alarm

  • TF에서 사용되는 callback 함수 예시

ReduceLROnPlateau, Modelcheckpoint, Earlystopping ...

Model checkpoint

valid score가 좋아질 때마다 저장 => 가장 좋았을 때의 w, b를 찾는데 유용

Early stopping

val loss가 n epochs 이상 개선되지 않으면 조기 종료
=> hyper parameter의 일종 : 데이터에 따라 loss graph 양상이 다를 수 밖에 없어서...
=> Modelcheckpoint, Earlystopping ... 종종 이 둘을 같이 쓰기도 한다.

ReduceLR On Plateau

val loss가 n epochs 이상 개선되지 않으면 facter param으로 학습률 LR 조정
DL 경험이 많거나 데이터의 특성을 잘 아는 사람이 사용해야 한다

  • ReduceLROnPlateau, Earlystopping 는 Develop phase 개발 단계에서 쓰지말고, release phase에서 쓸 것을 권장한다.
예제

지난주에 실습했던 FashionMNIST, ReduceLROnPlateau/ModelCheckpint/ModelCheckpint,EarlyStopping 콜백을 구현하였다.

cf. paper에서 데이터 선택 자체가 bias가 포함된 행위이다.

Pandas

data frame을 다루는 라이브러리

data definition -> init w, b -> define y, loss -> learn 의 순서로 이뤄지는데,
이걸 하기 전에 해야 하는 게 data preprocess 이다.

python에서는 pandas library를 활용해 진행하면 된다.
csv file 같은 table data를 다루는 데 적합하다.

data frame 생성

data frame을 만들 때는 list보다는 일반적으로 dict으로 만든다.

  • from dictionary data
import pandas as pd

data_dict = {'Name':['John','Sabre','Kim','Sato','Lee','Smith','David'],
             'Country':['USA','France','Korea','Japan','Korea','USA','USA'],
             'Age':[31,33,28,40,36,55,48],
             'job':['Student','Lawyer','Developer','Chef','Professor','CEO','Banker']
             }

df = pd.DataFrame(data_dict)

print(type(df))
print(df)

# <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>

#     Name Country  Age        job
# 0   John     USA   31    Student
# 1  Sabre  France   33     Lawyer
# 2    Kim   Korea   28  Developer
# 3   Sato   Japan   40       Chef
# 4    Lee   Korea   36  Professor
# 5  Smith     USA   55        CEO
# 6  David     USA   48     Banker
  • from list data
import pandas as pd

data_list = [['John','Sabre','Kim','Sato','Lee','Smith','David'],
             ['USA','France','Korea','Japan','Korea','USA','USA'],
             [31,33,28,40,36,55,48],
             ['Student','Lawyer','Developer','Chef','Professor','CEO','Banker']
             ]

column_name = ['Name','Country','Age','Job']            

df = pd.DataFrame(data_dict, columns = column_name)

print(type(df))
print(df)

# <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>
#     Name Country  Age  Job
# 0   John     USA   31  NaN
# 1  Sabre  France   33  NaN
# 2    Kim   Korea   28  NaN
# 3   Sato   Japan   40  NaN
# 4    Lee   Korea   36  NaN
# 5  Smith     USA   55  NaN
# 6  David     USA   48  NaN
기본 정보 확인
df.head()
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor

df.tail()
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df.info()
# <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>
# RangeIndex: 7 entries, 0 to 6
# Data columns (total 4 columns):
#  #   Column   Non-Null Count  Dtype
# ---  ------   --------------  -----
#  0   Name     7 non-null      object
#  1   Country  7 non-null      object
#  2   Age      7 non-null      int64
#  3   job      7 non-null      object
# dtypes: int64(1), object(3)
# memory usage: 352.0+ bytes

df.describe()
#       Age
# count	7.000000
# mean	38.714286
# std	9.724784
# min	28.000000
# 25%	32.000000
# 50%	36.000000
# 75%	44.000000
# max	55.000000

df.index
# RangeIndex(start=0, stop=7, step=1)

df.columns
# Index(['Name', 'Country', 'Age', 'Job'], dtype='object')
  • describe는 숫자로 된 컬럼들의 통계치를 뽑아낸다. outlier 파악에 좋다.
파일 저장 df.to_csv(...)
# index => yes
df.to_csv('./test_dataframe_with_index.csv',index=True)

# index => no
df.to_csv('./test_dataframe_without_index.csv',index=False)

# header => yes
df.to_csv('./test_dataframe_with_header.csv',header=True)

# header => no
df.to_csv('./test_dataframe_without_header.csv',header=False)

# header => yes, index => no
df.to_csv('./test_dataframe_with_header_without_index.csv',header=True,index=False)

# header => no, index => no
df.to_csv('./test_dataframe_without_header_without_index.csv',header=False,index=False)
csv 파일로부터 데이터프레임 생성 pd.read_csv(...)
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('./test_dataframe_with_header_without_index.csv')
df

# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('./test_dataframe_without_header_without_index.csv') # 첫번째 데이터를 헤더로 인식함
df

# John	USA	31	Student
# 0	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 1	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 2	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 3	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 4	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 5	David	USA	48	Banker

import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('./test_dataframe_without_header_without_index.csv',header=None)
df

cols =['Name','Country','Age','Job']
df.columns = cols
df

# Name	Country	Age	Job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

행은 loc를 쓰면 된다.

df[[열이름]] 으로 추출 가능하다.

df.loc[인덱스]가 유용하다. 안에 조건식을 넣을 수 있다 (iloc는 불가)

cf. df.loc[0:3] => 0~3행 추출

loc : 인덱스 기준으로 행 데이터 읽기 ==> 사용 권장
iloc : 행 번호를 기준으로 행 데이터 읽기

df
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

# 열 데이터 추출

df_job = df['job']
print(type(df_job))
df_job
# <class 'pandas.core.series.Series'>
# 0      Student
# 1       Lawyer
# 2    Developer
# 3         Chef
# 4    Professor
# 5          CEO
# 6       Banker
# Name: job, dtype: object

df_job = df[['job']]
print(type(df_job))
df_job
# <class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>
# job
# 0	Student
# 1	Lawyer
# 2	Developer
# 3	Chef
# 4	Professor
# 5	CEO
# 6	Banker

df_country_job = df[['Country','job']]
df_country_job
# Country	job
# 0	USA	Student
# 1	France	Lawyer
# 2	Korea	Developer
# 3	Japan	Chef
# 4	Korea	Professor
# 5	USA	CEO
# 6	USA	Banker

cols = ['Country','job']
df_country_job = df[cols]
df_country_job
# Country	job
# 0	USA	Student
# 1	France	Lawyer
# 2	Korea	Developer
# 3	Japan	Chef
# 4	Korea	Professor
# 5	USA	CEO
# 6	USA	Banker
df.loc[] 이용하여 행(row) 데이터 추출
df_1st_row = df.loc[[0]]
df_1st_row
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student

df_1st_4th_row = df.loc[[0,3]]
df_1st_4th_row
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef

df_slice = df.loc[ 0:3 ]
df_slice
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
  • self study
type(df.loc[0]), df.loc[0]
# (pandas.core.series.Series, Name          John
#  Country        USA
#  Age             31
#  job        Student
#  Name: 0, dtype: object)

type(df.loc[[0]]), df.loc[[0]]
# (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame,    Name Country  Age      job
#  0  John     USA   31  Student)

df.loc[0, :]
# Name          John
# Country        USA
# Age             31
# job        Student
# Name: 0, dtype: object

df.loc[[0],:]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student

df.loc[[0,3],:]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef

df.loc[0:3, :]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
df.loc[] 이용하여 조건에 맞는 행(row) 데이터 추출
df.loc[df['Country']=='USA']
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df.loc[df['Age']>30]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker
  • self study
df.loc[df['Age']>30,:]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df.loc[df['Age']>30,['job']]
# job
# 0	Student
# 1	Lawyer
# 3	Chef
# 4	Professor
# 5	CEO
# 6	Banker

df.loc[(df['Age']>30) & (df['job']=='Chef')]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef

df.loc[(df['Age']>30) | (df['job']=='Chef')]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker
df.iloc[] 이용하여 행(row) 데이터 추출 (사용법 혼란스러우면 skip)
df_1st_row = df.iloc[0]
df_1st_row
# Name          John
# Country        USA
# Age             31
# job        Student
# Name: 0, dtype: object

df_1st_4th_row = df.iloc[[0,3]]
df_1st_4th_row
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef

df_slice = df.iloc[0:3]
df_slice
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
df.loc[] 이용한 행과 열 데이터 동시 추출
df.loc[[1],:]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer

df.loc[[1,3],['Name','job']]
# Name	job
# 1	Sabre	Lawyer
# 3	Sato	Chef

df.loc[:,:]
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker
  • self study
for index in range(len(df)):
  print(type(df.loc[index, ['Name','Country']]))
  print(df.loc[index, ['Name','Country']])
  print('===================')
  print(type(df.loc[[index],['Name','Country']]))
  print(df.loc[[index],['Name','Country']])
  print('===================')

행과 열 삭제 df.drop()

행 삭제 : df.drop(index, axis=0) -> axis = 0 행, axis = 1 열
열 삭제 : df.drop(column name, axis=1) -> axis = 0 행, axis = 1 열

df = df.drop(1, axis = 0)
df
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df = df.drop([3,5],axis=0)
df
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df = df.reset_index()
df
# index	Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 2	4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 3	6	David	USA	48	Banker
df
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df.drop(1, axis=0, inplace=True)
df
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df.drop([3, 5], axis=0, inplace=True)
df
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker

df.reset_index(inplace=True)
df
# level_0	index	Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	0	0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	1	2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 2	2	4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 3	3	6	David	USA	48	Banker

열 추가
df
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor

new_data = {'Name':'Park',
            'Country':'Korea',
            'Age':36,
            'job':'chef'}

df = df.append(new_data, ignore_index=True)
df            
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker
# 7	Park	Korea	36	che

1줄 추가되었다.

행과 열 추가

행 추가 : df.append(dict_new_data, ignore_index=True)
열 추가 : df[‘column’], df.assign()

df
#     Name Country  Age        job
# 0   John     USA   31    Student
# 1  Sabre  France   33     Lawyer
# 2    Kim   Korea   28  Developer
# 3   Sato   Japan   40       Chef
# 4    Lee   Korea   36  Professor
# 5  Smith     USA   55        CEO
# 6  David     USA   48     Banker

new_data = {'Name':'Koga',
            'Country':'Japan',
            'Age':26,
            'job':'player'}

df = df.append(new_data, ignore_index=True)
df            
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker
# 7	Koga	Japan	26	player
df['New_Col1'] = df['Age'] / 2.0
df
# Name	Country	Age	job	New_Col1
# 0	John	USA	31	Student	15.5
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer	16.5
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer	14.0
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef	20.0
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor	18.0
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO	27.5
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker	24.0
# 7	Koga	Japan	26	player	13.0

add_val_1 = df['Age'].values
add_val_2 = df['New_Col1'].values
df = df.assign(ADD_1 = add_val_1, ADD_2=add_val_2)
df
# Name	Country	Age	job	New_Col1	ADD_1	ADD_2
# 0	John	USA	31	Student	15.5	31	15.5
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer	16.5	33	16.5
# 2	Kim	Korea	28	Developer	14.0	28	14.0
# 3	Sato	Japan	40	Chef	20.0	40	20.0
# 4	Lee	Korea	36	Professor	18.0	36	18.0
# 5	Smith	USA	55	CEO	27.5	55	27.5
# 6	David	USA	48	Banker	24.0	48	24.0
# 7	Koga	Japan	26	player	13.0	26	13.0
데이터프레임 합치기 pd.concat()

axis=0은 위아래방향으로 합쳐진다.

data1 = {'Name':['John','Sabre'],
        'Country':['USA','France'],
        'Age':[31,33],
        'job':['Student','Lawyer']}

df1 = pd.DataFrame(data1)
df1        
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer

data2 = {'Name':['Lee','Smith'],
        'Country':['Korea','USA'],
        'Age':[36,55],
        'job':['Professor','CEO']}

df2 = pd.DataFrame(data2)
df2        
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 1	Smith	USA	55	CEO

pd.concat([df1,df2],axis=0,ignore_index=True)
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 3	Smith	USA	55	CEO

############################################

df3 = pd.concat([df1,df2],axis=0)
df3
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 0	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 1	Smith	USA	55	CEO

df4 = pd.concat([df1,df2],axis=0, ignore_index=True)
df4
# Name	Country	Age	job
# 0	John	USA	31	Student
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer
# 2	Lee	Korea	36	Professor
# 3	Smith	USA	55	CEO

axis=1은 좌우방향으로 합쳐진다.

data5 = {'Salary':1000,
         'Hobby':['Run']
         }
df5 = pd.DataFrame(data5)
df5         
# Salary	Hobby
# 0	1000	Run

df6 = pd.concat([df1,df5], axis=1)
df6
# Name	Country	Age	job	Salary	Hobby
# 0	John	USA	31	Student	1000.0	Run
# 1	Sabre	France	33	Lawyer	NaN	NaN
열 순서 변경
column_name = ['Age','job','Country','Name']
df1 = df[column_name]
df1
# Age	job	Country	Name
# 0	31	Student	USA	John
# 1	33	Lawyer	France	Sabre
# 2	28	Developer	Korea	Kim
# 3	40	Chef	Japan	Sato
# 4	36	Professor	Korea	Lee
# 5	55	CEO	USA	Smith
# 6	48	Banker	USA	David
# 7	26	player	Japan	Koga
특정 열 제외

정답과 나머지 학습 데이터를 분리할 때 유용하다.

df2 =df[df.columns.difference(['Age','job'])]
df2
# ADD_1	ADD_2	Country	Name	New_Col1
# 0	31	15.5	USA	John	15.5
# 1	33	16.5	France	Sabre	16.5
# 2	28	14.0	Korea	Kim	14.0
# 3	40	20.0	Japan	Sato	20.0
# 4	36	18.0	Korea	Lee	18.0
# 5	55	27.5	USA	Smith	27.5
# 6	48	24.0	USA	David	24.0
# 7	26	13.0	Japan	Koga	13.0
결측치 nan
  1. Missing Data 개수 확인 => df.isnull().sum()
  2. 각 열(column)에 있는 각각의 Data 개수 확인 (NaN 제외한 데이터 개수)

df[‘Name’].value_counts(), df[‘Country’].value_counts()...
3) NaN 값이 있는 행(row) 모두 제거
4) Missing Data 를 특정 값으로 변경하기 (각 열의 NaN) : df[‘열이름’].fillna(변경값, inplace=True)
5) Missing Data 를 특정 값으로 변경하기 (모든 NaN ) : df.fillna(변경값, inplace=True)

cf. [appendix] mean(), median(), replace()
fillna() 에서 NaN 을 특정 값으로 변경할때 mean() 또는 median() 등으로 바꾸는 경우가 많음 (통계의 오류는 감안 해야함)

replace() 함수 이용하여 NaN ⇒ 특정값 또는 특정값 ⇒ NaN 으로 변경하는 경우도 있음
(특정값은 일반적으로 outlier 경우가 일반적임)

kaggle diabetes

https://www.kaggle.com/uciml/pima-indians-diabetes-database

위 링크에 있는 파일을 다운로드 받아서
당뇨병 발병 예측에 관한 실습을 진행하였다.

import matplotlib
import pandas as pd
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv('kaggle_diabetes.csv')
df.head()

# 전체 히스토그램을 살펴본다
df.hist()

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

# 개별 히스토그램을 살펴본다
df['BloodPressure'].hist()

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

df.info()

df.describe()

# missing value 확인
df.isnull().sum()
# Pregnancies                 0
# Glucose                     0
# BloodPressure               0
# SkinThickness               0
# Insulin                     0
# BMI                         0
# DiabetesPedigreeFunction    0
# Age                         0
# Outcome                     0
# dtype: int64

print("Number of rows with 0 values for each variable\n")

for col in df.columns:
  missing_rows = df.loc[df[col]==0].shape[0]
  print(col+ " : " + str(missing_rows))

# Number of rows with 0 values for each variable
#
# Pregnancies : 111
# Glucose : 5
# BloodPressure : 35
# SkinThickness : 227
# Insulin : 374
# BMI : 11
# DiabetesPedigreeFunction : 0
# Age : 0
# Outcome : 500

import numpy as np

# outlier 처리
df['Glucose'] = df['Glucose'].replace(0, np.nan)
df['BloodPressure'] = df['BloodPressure'].replace(0, np.nan)
df['SkinThickness'] = df['SkinThickness'].replace(0, np.nan)
df['Insulin'] = df['Insulin'].replace(0, np.nan)
df['BMI'] = df['BMI'].replace(0, np.nan)

# missing value 처리
df['Glucose'] = df['Glucose'].fillna(df['Glucose'].mean())
df['BloodPressure'] = df['BloodPressure'].fillna(df['BloodPressure'].mean())
df['SkinThickness'] = df['SkinThickness'].fillna(df['SkinThickness'].mean())
df['Insulin'] = df['Insulin'].fillna(df['Insulin'].mean())
df['BMI'] = df['BMI'].fillna(df['BMI'].mean())

print("Number of rows with 0 values for each variable\n")

for col in df.columns:
  missing_rows = df.loc[df[col]==0].shape[0]
  print(col+ " : " + str(missing_rows))  

# Number of rows with 0 values for each variable
#
# Pregnancies : 111
# Glucose : 0
# BloodPressure : 0
# SkinThickness : 0
# Insulin : 0
# BMI : 0
# DiabetesPedigreeFunction : 0
# Age : 0
# Outcome : 500
# 데이터 표준화
df_scaled = df # 원본 DataFrame 보존
df_scaled.describe()

# feature column,label column 추출 후 DataFrame 생성
feature_df = df_scaled[df_scaled.columns.difference(['Outcome'])]
label_df = df_scaled['Outcome']
print(feature_df.shape, label_df.shape)
# (768, 8) (768,)

# pandas <=> numpy 테스트
feature_np = feature_df.to_numpy()
label_np = label_df.to_numpy()
print(feature_np.shape, label_np.shape)
# (768, 8) (768,)
# train / test data 분리

split = 0.15

test_num = int(split*len(label_np))

x_test = feature_np[0:test_num]
y_test = label_np[0:test_num]

x_train = feature_np[test_num:]
y_train = label_np[test_num:]

print(x_train.shape, y_train.shape)
print(x_test.shape, y_test.shape)
# (653, 8) (653,)
# (115, 8) (115,)

import tensorflow as tf
from tensorflow.keras.models import Sequential
from tensorflow.keras.layers import Dense

model = Sequential()
model.add(Dense(8, activation = 'relu', input_shape=(8,) ))
model.add(Dense(1, activation='sigmoid'))

model.compile(optimizer=tf.keras.optimizers.Adam(), # SGD() 변경해서 테스트
              loss = 'binary_crossentropy', metrics=['accuracy'])

from datetime import datetime

start_time = datetime.now()
hist = model.fit(x_train, y_train, epochs=200, validation_data=(x_test, y_test))
end_time = datetime.now()
print('elapsed time => ', end_time-start_time)
# Epoch 200/200
# 21/21 [==============================] - 0s 3ms/step - loss: 0.5497 - accuracy: 0.7366 - val_loss: 0.5918 - val_accuracy: 0.6609
# elapsed time =>  0:00:21.499993

model.evaluate(x_test,y_test) # 또는 pred = model.predict(...)
# 4/4 [==============================] - 0s 4ms/step - loss: 0.5918 - accuracy: 0.6609
# [0.591831624507904, 0.6608695387840271]

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.title('loss trend')
plt.xlabel('epochs')
plt.ylabel('loss')
plt.grid()

plt.plot(hist.history['loss'], label='train loss')
plt.plot(hist.history['val_loss'], label='validation loss')
plt.legend(loc='best')

plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.title('accuracy trend')
plt.xlabel('epochs')
plt.ylabel('loss')
plt.grid()

plt.plot(hist.history['accuracy'], label='train accuracy')
plt.plot(hist.history['val_accuracy'], label='validation accuracy')
plt.legend(loc='best')

plt.show()
